title: How To Build A Shopify Store Masterclass
headline: Learn how to use Shopify to start a successful e-commerce store from start to finish in this free online course.
description: This free online Shopify course will guide you through all the key processes involved in creating an e-commerce store with Shopify. You will be shown how to create collections, install and customize a theme and add products to your Shopify store as well as basic data analysis, paid advertising, and content marketing methods that will help you upgrade your business to the next level in order to take advantage of the age of online shopping.

courseDescription:
Shopify is one of the most popular and fastest-growing e-commerce platforms in the world. If youâ€™re looking to build your own e-commerce store, Shopify is one of the best options to get started with. This e-commerce course will take you through the entire step-by-step process of creating your own Shopify store from start to finish and you will start learning about Shopify and the numerous benefits of using it. The first step of owning and running an ecommerce store using Shopify is to set up a Shopify account. The process of doing this includes selecting a Shopify plan, learning how to navigate the dashboard and choosing a theme from the theme store. Designing and customizing your Shopify store is the next step and you will learn how to do this using the theme tab in the dashboard menu. You will be shown how to acquire, brand and customize inventories for your Shopify store from manufacturers and suppliers such as Alibaba and AliExpress and guide you through the process of placing orders from these manufacturers and suppliers. The course content also explores the different ways to add Amazon FBA (Fulfillment By Amazon) private label products to your Shopify store.

The more data you have about your customers, the better you can understand their interests. Understanding what your customers are doing on your Shopify store helps you to see how your store is performing. You will be taught how to analyze data using Google Analytics and Facebook Pixel which can help you optimize and improve your products, storefront, marketing, and advertising campaigns (including Google AdWords). Some other key topics you will learn about in detail include how to create a domain name for your Shopify store, a custom blog post, Shopify apps such as 'Checkout', 'Email Marketing', 'Notification' and more. The next bit of the course discusses how to manage your inventory with the Amazon seller app, how the Shopify mobile app works, and how it can be used to manage your Shopify store as a business owner. It is very important to diversify your income and a Shopify store will provide a new sales channel for your private label product, reducing your reliance on Amazon and similar platforms. This in-depth course will teach you how to market your products, get more customers to your Shopify store and leverage paid advertising and content marketing through highly targeted ads.  

E-commerce is rapidly growing worldwide and will soon account for over 60% of retail sales. This Shopify course is excellent for beginners who want to start their own online store and all you need is an internet connection, computer and a little bit of time. You should enrol if you have always wanted to have an online shop to generate income and are keen on learning how Shopify can unlock your online business goals.

Start Course Now
certificateDetail:
All Alison courses are free to enrol study and complete. To successfully complete this certificate course and become an Alison Graduate, you need to achieve 80% or higher in each course assessment. Once you have completed this certificate course, you have the option to acquire an official Diploma, which is a great way to share your achievement with the world.

Your Alison certificate is:
  • Ideal for sharing with potential employers
  • Include it in your CV, professional social media profiles and job applications.
  • An indication of your commitment to continuously learn, upskill & achieve high results.
  • An incentive for you to continue empowering yourself through lifelong learning.
Alison offers 3 types of Diplomas for completed Diploma courses:
  • Digital certificate: a downloadable certificate in PDF format immediately available to you when you complete your purchase.
  • certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security-marked certificate, posted to you with FREE shipping.
  • Framed certificate: a physical version of your officially branded and security marked certificate in a stylish frame, posted to you with FREE shipping.
Start Course Now

All certificate are available to purchase through the Alison Shop. For more information on purchasing Alison certificate, please visit our FAQs. If you decide not to purchase your Alison certificate, you can still demonstrate your achievement by sharing your Learner Record or Learner Achievement Verification, both of which are accessible from your Dashboard. For more details on our certificate pricing, please visit our Pricing Page

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be introduced to Shopify and its various benefits for e-commerce and how to create and set up a Shopify account. This module goes on to show you how to navigate the Shopify dashboard to see your total visit for the day, a summary of your activities and more. You will explore the process of adding Shopify products to Amazon catalog, how you can prepare and send inventories to Amazon FBA and how to create a product collection and add it to a Shopify store.
topics: Building Your Shopify Store - Learning Outcomes
Building Your Shopify Store - Lesson Summary

modules.name: Module
modules.description: In this module, you will be taught how to analyse your traffic volume, sources, demographics and tons of other data for your Shopify store. You will be shown how to install Facebook pixel to your Shopify store and create a Google Analytics code to add to your Shopify store. You will then be taught how to analyze and track your customer store visits using Google Analytics and the Facebook pixel. Furthermore, you will learn how to create a custom domain name for your Shopify store.
topics: Fulfilling Customer Orders and Marketing - Learning Outcomes
Fulfilling Customer Orders and Marketing - Lesson Summary

topics: Course Assessment - How To Build A Shopify Store - Masterclass

slides:
• Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Explain how to select a Shopify plan and create a Shopify account.
    • Illustrate how to navigate the Shopify dashboard. 
    • Demonstrate how to design a Shopify store.
    • Identify the differences between Alibaba suppliers and AliExpress suppliers. 
    • Recall the processes of adding products to the Amazon catalogue. 
    • Discuss how to add products to the Shopify store.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The key concepts covered in this module are:
    • Shopify allows you to control every aspect of your business. You can collect your customer's email address and start building an email wizard for marketing.
    • Shopify platform allows you to fully and easily customize and brand your store, add unlimited products and inventory easily. It also allows you to fulfill customer orders and track your sales Analytics.
    • The major account plans offered by Shopify are basic Shopify, regular Shopify and advanced Shopify plans.
    • Shopify offers a 14-day free trial period so you can review the plan and upgrade or downgrade if needed.
    • On the Shopify dashboard, the product tab can be used to add new products, import products using CSV files, manage inventory transfers, manage inventory tracking, organise your products and create gift cards for your store.
    • You should narrow your search to suppliers that have been assessed and have gold status. This ensures that you get the best products from reliable suppliers.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The key concepts covered in this module are:
    • Shopify allows you to control every aspect of your business. You can collect your customer's email address and start building an email wizard for marketing.
    • Shopify platform allows you to fully and easily customize and brand your store, add unlimited products and inventory easily. It also allows you to fulfill customer orders and track your sales Analytics.
    • The major account plans offered by Shopify are basic Shopify, regular Shopify and advanced Shopify plans.
    • Shopify offers a 14-day free trial period so you can review the plan and upgrade or downgrade if needed.
    • On the Shopify dashboard, the product tab can be used to add new products, import products using CSV files, manage inventory transfers, manage inventory tracking, organise your products and create gift cards for your store.
    • You should narrow your search to suppliers that have been assessed and have gold status. This ensures that you get the best products from reliable suppliers.

  • Learning Outcomes

  • Having completed this module you will be able to:
    • Describe how to store inventory using Amazon FBA. 
    • Discuss ways to market and promote products using paid advertising and content marketing. 
    • Identify the differences between paid advertising and content marketing. 
    • Explain the process of tracking customer orders. 
    • Examine how to use Google Analytics to generate reports and how it can be used to optimize marketing campaigns. 
    • Discuss the various payment processing options on the Shopify store. 
    • Illustrate how to use Google and Facebook ads campaigns to promote Shopify products.

  • Lesson Summary

  • The key concepts covered in this module are:
    • To create google analytics, go to googleanalytics.com and create a new account, fill in the necessary information and get your tracking code. Next, log in to your Shopify account, click on the online store tab, click the preferences menu, input your tracking code into the google analytic section and click the save button.
    • When inserting the URL to your Shopify store, do not include the https// in the front as this would create an error message.
    • The Facebook pixel is a tracking code you can add to your store to retarget, optimise and track the effectiveness of your advertising campaigns.
    • In order for you to use the Facebook pixel, you must have a Facebook business account.
    • To install the Facebook pixel tool, Go to your Facebook business account click on the pixels link and copy your pixel ID, then go to your Shopify account and click on the online store tab, click the preference menu, input your pixel ID into the Facebook pixel section and then click the save button.
    • Adding a custom domain name will look more professional and would be better for branding.

  • Lesson Summary
